title: The Haunting
overview: Jiang Shuo, accidentally took over the business of buying and selling houses, where the gruesome murders took places. Together with his partner Qin Yi Heng, through his bravery and ingenuity, as well as his determination to break the stigma around the houses, he helps the homeowners to break the rumors and allow the buildings to return to the market for sale. But is it really true, that bad reputation of the locations, is based only on urban legend or those buildings really hides some dark secrets?
